mapper.insert: insert into E_LMP_BM_DAY (MPED_ID, DATA_TIME, P1R0, P2R0, P3R0, P4R0, P1R1, P2R1, P3R1, P4R1, P1R2, P2R2, P3R2, P4R2, P1R3, P2R3, P3R3, P4R3, P1R4, P2R4, P3R4, P4R4, P1R5, P2R5, P3R5, P4R5, SAVEDATETIME, AREA_CODE, "STATUS") values (#{mpedId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{p1r0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p2r0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p3r0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p4r0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p1r1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p2r1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p3r1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p4r1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p1r2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p2r2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p3r2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p4r2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p1r3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p2r3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p3r3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p4r3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p1r4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p2r4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p3r4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p4r4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p1r5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p2r5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p3r5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p4r5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{savedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.sql: MPED_ID, DATA_TIME, P1R0, P2R0,P3R0, P4R0, P1R1, P2R1,P3R1, P4R1, P1R2, P2R2,P3R2, P4R2, P1R3, P2R3, P3R3, P4R3, P1R4, P2R4,P3R4, P4R4, P1R5, P2R5,P3R5, P4R5, SAVEDATETIME,AREA_CODE, "STATUS"
